attributes.action: Stop food outlets from charging to "upgrade" from normal chips to curly fries.
attributes.additional_details: A bag of curly fries cost little extra than a bag of normal chips at trade cost. Stop food outlets from charging the "upgrade" stealth tax.
attributes.background: The large majority of food outlets charge extra to "upgrade" from normal chips to curly fries, at a usually extortionate rate of around £1. Surely, switching from one style of potato chip to another is a "side grade" and therefore should be a free service.
